imageToolkit 0.0.0.9000

Package index

All functions

cluster_variable()
Cluster variable 1 based on mean values. Pass columns directly (not as strings) e.g. df %>% cluster_variable(drugname, gene, expression) %>% ggplot() Clusters by first variable only, so run twice to cluster both ways
interactive_data_select()
Interactively select intensity data using a lasso gate
plot_confusion()
Plot a nicely formatted model confusion matrix
plot_intensity_2d()
Interactive plot of 2d intensity data
train_cnn()
Train a CNN on a directory of images This function trains a keras CNN model on a folder of n-dimensional images and returns the trained model together with validation data

Developed by Daniel Greenwood.
